remarks: The integral of a piecewise continuous periodic function ` F ` is unchanged if the domain is shifted by its period ` T ` .  In this lemma, ` T ` is assumed to be strictly positive.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
